op.title: Secret Power Armor in development
op.body: Army is fielding designs for a new power armor. Was the T51 a failure?

replies.body: Was your source a man of jaundiced complexion with a name that sounds like Wang? Quit spreading this subversive commie bullshit.
The T51 is still good, I think yr source is wrong
ENJOY YOUR COMMUNISM TRAITOR. I HOPE IT WAS WORTH IT
Cope harder guys, the People's Liberation Loveboat sails strong :-)
